revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Mistralton Cave |image = [[File:Mistralton Cave.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Mistralton Cave. |tokens = 196,500 |location = Unova Route 6 }} '''Mistralton Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Unova]]. It initially has 81 tiles arranged in an 9x9 square, including 9 chest tiles, 21 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 3,603,000 HP.
==Encounter Tables==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Boldore.png|40px]] Boldore || [[File:Hiker.png|40px]] Hiker Shelby || [[File:Boldore.png|40px]] Boldore |- | [[File:Woobat.png|40px]] Woobat || [[File:Hiker.png|40px]] Hiker Jebediah || [[File:Onix.png|40px]] Onix |- | [[File:Aron.png|40px]] Aron || [[File:Ace_Trainer_(male).png|40px]] Ace Trainer Geoff || [[File:Tirtouga.png|40px]] Tirtouga, [[File:Axew.png|40px]] Axew |- | [[File:Lairon.png|40px]] Lairon || [[File:Ace_Trainer_(female).png|40px]] Ace Trainer Belle || [[File:Archen.png|40px]] Archen, [[File:Axew.png|40px]] Axew |}
===Boss Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Drilbur.png|40px]] Drilbur || <center>23,000,000 || rowspan=3 colspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Axew.png|40px]] Axew || <center>24,000,000 |- | [[File:Cobalion.png|40px]] Cobalion || <center>25,000,000 |}
